alert.note: Alert for Adams; Dauphin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 7:33PM EST until March 07 at 8:30PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lancaster County in south central Pennsylvania... Eastern Adams County in south central Pennsylvania... York County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 830 PM EST. * At 733 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Steelton to Bonneauville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, York, Lower Allen, Hanover, Ephrata, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Columbia, Lititz, Middletown, Millersville, Gettysburg, Mount Joy, New Cumberland, Parkville, Red Lion, New Holland, Manheim, Akron and Hampton. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 242 to 295. Interstate 83 from mile markers 0 to 39. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
